title: Pablo Serrano - Universidad Carlos III de Madrid
text:
Welcome
I am a Full Professor at the Department of Telematic Engineering of Universidad Carlos III de Madrid. My research focuses on wireless networking, performance evaluation, and the intersection of AI and communications.


Research Interests

Next-G Wireless: 6G architecture and O-RAN.
Network Intelligence: Applying Reinforcement Learning to resource allocation.
Connected Industry 4.0: Director of the UC3M Masterâ€™s program.
